name: Be killed or kill
description:
You are on a quest to kill the almighty Draguun! But before you can do that, you need to train and gain 3 LVL:S! It's your job to bring peace to the town again and free the prisoners! Good luck!

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Interact(Shop and Dialogue): E

This game was made for the WOWIE game jam in 3 days!

Don't be discouraged to post about some bugs!
